manifest.DESCRIPTION: Displays statistics for the service desk.

widget.REQUIRED_GAUGE_FOREGROUND_COLOUR: Foreground Gauge Colour is a required field.
widget.INVALID_GAUGE_FOREGROUND_COLOUR: Invalid Foreground Gauge Colour (required format is #000 or #000000).
widget.REQUIRED_GAUGE_BACKGROUND_COLOUR: Background Gauge Colour is a required field.
widget.INVALID_GAUGE_BACKGROUND_COLOUR: Invalid Background Gauge Colour (required format is #000 or #000000).
widget.REQUIRED_COUNTER_COLOUR: Counter Colour is a required field.
widget.INVALID_COUNTER_COLOUR: Invalid Counter Colour (required format is #000 or #000000).
widget.REQUIRED_COUNTER_HIGHLIGHT_COLOUR: Counter Highlight Colour is a required field.
widget.INVALID_COUNTER_HIGHLIGHT_COLOUR: Invalid Counter Highlight Colour (required format is #000 or #000000).
widget.REQUIRED_COUNTER_BORDER_COLOUR: Counter Border Colour is a required field.
widget.INVALID_COUNTER_BORDER_COLOUR: Invalid Counter Border Colour (required format is #000 or #000000).
widget.REQUIRED_COUNTER_TEXT_COLOUR: Counter Text Colour is a required field.
widget.INVALID_COUNTER_TEXT_COLOUR: Invalid Counter Text Colour (required format is #000 or #000000).
widget.OPEN_REQUESTS_WITHIN_SLA_RESPONSE_TIME: Open Requests Within SLA Response Time
widget.OPEN_REQUESTS_WITHIN_SLA_FIX_TIME: Open Requests Within SLA Fix Time
